item.description:
Here is the plan:

2pm - John Harvard's
3.30 - People's Republik
5pm - Tavern on the Square (Central Square) - we have a longer stop here if people want to eat.
7pm - The Field
8pm - Phoenix Landing
9pm - The Asgard

The t-shirts been ordered and are being printed. They work out to be $16 each. I did order a couple of extras so if you want one let me know as they are going fast but if need be I may be able to add to the order early next week. KC designed the shirt to not only show you where you need to be next but also to help you count your drinks along the way - nice!!

You can pick them up at December thirsy first Thursday if you tell me in advance or you can pick them up at the pubcrawl. I've had to pay for them all in advance.

ID: You will need you Mass drivers licence or your passport. Harvard and Central are quite strict so please remember to bring this along or you won't get in.

I'll email out some cell phone number closer to the time so can find us if you are late.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Chrissy Pub Crawl - 12 beers of Christmas
